snippet: Through an agreement that will be announced Wednesday, Fox Sports 1 will televise 25 Mexico games starting this year and continuing until the 2018 World Cup.
abstract: Fox Sports acquires rights to televise 25 games featuring wildly popular Mexican national soccer team; mix of friendlies and 2018 World Cup qualifiers, some played at United States sites, could include US-Mexico contest in final round of World Cup qualifying.
lead_paragraph: Through an agreement that will be announced Wednesday, Fox Sports 1 will televise 25 Mexico games starting this year and continuing until the 2018 World Cup.

headline.main: Fox Adds Mexico’s National Team to Its Soccer Stable
headline.print_headline: Fox Adds the Mexican National Team to Its Soccer Stable
